prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a Synth Pad, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Bass, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This song is composed of a Synth Pad, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Bass, omitting the Piano.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Synth Pad, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Bass, Piano excluded.
